Text: how the fuck do your torrents not work? download as an avi file yet every thing i try and play it on says "unsupported data"

I registered just to confirm that there is something unusual about your torrents - at least from my end.  You upload some very unique shows, so the other day I downloaded several.  None of them play on my PS3.  They all come up as unsupported.  I tried a remux to an mp4 container which didn't work.  I tried a remux which converted the audio to AAC and that didn't work.  The only way I can get your files to play on PS3 is a complete reencoding.  Not trying to be a jerk, just thought you might want to know in case it's an easy fix.  I appreciate your efforts.
All of the torrents play for me.  I'm using a desktop PC.  I can play them in Windows Media and VLC.
Works fine with VLC and my Western Digital media player.
thank you as always!  works fine for me too in VLC

@whatabout81 Why so confrontational, especially when it seems that the problem may be on the client side? I never have a problem with any of these much-wanted downloads. Thanks to verovenio and the Scene
all torrents i upload are checked before uploading so that means they all played fine on my pc
